title: SOLD: 1909 T212-1 Obak Brackenridge horizontal beater...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1909 T212-1 Obak Brackenridge horizontal beater...
posts.post_content:
The old boy has seen better days, but finding horizontal Obaks is a challenge in itself.  I've seen worse out there.

SGC slab included at no extra charge.  :D

SOLD postpaid.  Please send me a PM if interested.  Thank you.

[IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee76/seablaster/Brack1_zpsef79546b.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee76/seablaster/Brack2_zpsa89b9bbc.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take it.

Mark

Plz send details, thx
